```{ojs}

querystrings = new URL(location).searchParams

node = querystrings.get("node")
```

This is a webR-enabled code cell in a Quarto HTML document.


```{webr}
#| include: true
#| autorun: true
#| runbutton: false
#| edit: false
library(resourcecodedata)
library(resourcecode)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

```{webr}
#| autorun: true
#| timelimit: 0
#| input:
#|   - node

ts <- get_parameters(node =  node, parameters = c("hs", "tp", "dp"),end="1994-01-01 23:00:00")
```

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Summary statistics

```{webr}
#| autorun: true
summary(ts)
```

## Time series

```{webr}
plot_ly(ts, x = ~time,y= ~hs ,type='scatter',mode='both')
```

## Bivariate plot

```{webr}
#| autorun: true

ggplot(data=ts)+
  aes(x=hs,y=tp)+
  geom_hex()+
  scale_fill_viridis_c()+
  theme_bw()
```

```{webr}
#| autorun: true

ggplot(data=ts)+
  aes(x=hs,y=dp)+
  geom_hex()+
  scale_fill_viridis_c()+
  theme_bw()
```

## Wind and wave roses

```{webr}
#| autorun: true
openair::windRose(ts,ws = "hs",wd = "dp",angle = 10,paddle = FALSE,key.footer = "m",key.header = "Hs",key = list(footer="Significant Wave Height (m)"),ws.int = .3)
```
